metadata.title: CVE-2021-33096 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper isolation of shared resources in network on chip for the Intel(R)82599 Ethernet Controllers and Adapters may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable denial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
